name: Spellrune: Realm of Portals
description: Spellrune is a singleplayer collectible card game with rogue-like and role-playing elements set in a fantasy world. Take the role of a wizard apprentice, build a powerful spell deck, defeat hordes of creatures and collect magic artifacts.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0+ GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Video Memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 256 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 3.0+ GHz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB Video Memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 512 MB available space
